official_title: A bill to award a special congressional gold medal to the daughter of Gutzon Borglum.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, on behalf of the Congress, to present to Mrs. David Vhay a gold medal in recognition of the contributions and talents of her father, Gutzon Borglum, the sculptor who carved the great stone faces of four U.S. Presidents on Mount Rushmore in South Dakota. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to award a special congressional gold medal to the daughter of Gutzon Borglum.
